# Olas Build

> App for building, monetizing, and hiring AI agents in the Olas ecosystem

## Overview

Build is the Olas app for developers and businesses to create AI agents, monetize their work, and hire pre-built agents for various use cases.

## Key Features

- Build an Agent: Create custom AI agents with guided workflows
- Hire an Agent: Browse and deploy pre-built AI agents
- Monetize Your Agent: Earn rewards by sharing your agents
- Dev Incentives: Access developer rewards and incentive programs
- Opportunities: Discover building opportunities in the ecosystem
- Paths: Follow structured learning paths for agent development

## Documentation

- Website: https://build.olas.network/
- Documentation: https://build.olas.network/docs
- Disclaimer: https://olas.network/disclaimer

## Technology

Built with Next.js, React, and Web3 technologies. Supports multiple blockchain networks and integrates with the Olas protocol for AI agents.
